snippet.title: HALT DEMO LAUNCH TRAILER
snippet.description:
With the arrival of a terrorist supergroup, a detective underdog must protect the city - or question everything.

HALT is a story-driven run-&-gun platformer that combines classic RPG-style gameplay with intense arcade action platforming. 

A game by Bunkbed Fantasy
Soundtrack by RJ Lake

Itch.Io - https://bunkbedfantasy.itch.io/halt
Dev Blog - https://bunkbedfantasy.com
Game Twitter - https://twitter.com/HALTdepartment
